name: noplanfuture-app
description: Full-stack fitness tracking app with Next.js and Express

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:client && npm run install:server
scripts.dev: npm run install:all && concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.start: npm run install:all && concurrently "npm run start:server" "npm run start:client"
scripts.start:client: cd client && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.build: npm run install:all && cd client && npm run build
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all
